page.title: 10SPORT FOR GURNARD BOYS.
page.content: There are four football teams in Gurnard.Under 10's,under 11's,under 13's and under 15's.Gurnard Youth under 10's football team this year achieved a league and cup double in only their second season in competition.They won the I.W. Sunday Youth league's under 10's division after beating Binstead 3-2 in a play off and also won the cup,beating the same opposition after a replay. The boys also reached the quarter-final of the Hampshire Youth cup.Most of the boys in the team live in Cowes,not in Gurnard. BMX'S bikes are built strongly for rough ground,and for stunt riding and you can take jumps with them.You can ride a BMX up a six foot high ramp,spin round at the top and ride down again.
